div.head: 經水適來適斷
div.div: menstruation that is sometimes regular sometimes interrupted

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Jing shui shi lai shi duan

entry.def: menstruation that is sometimes regular sometimes interrupted

sense.def: Pathological Condition of yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 , menstrual irregularity, with menstruation that sometimes arrives in due time, and fails to arrive at others. Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 14: 經 水適來適斷，病後勞復，餘熱不解，宜服黃龍湯 , “For menstruation that is sometimes regular, sometimes interrupted , and if it returns after a disease episode, when [the woman] is in a state of exhaustion, with remnant heat not dissolved, it is advisable to ingest the decoction with huang long ”.
